export const title = "AI Agent"

### Chat with SQL Agent

<Callout title="Warning" variant="warning">
To use this feature, please set your `OPENAI_API_KEY` in `.env` file.

After setting the API key, let's ask "What is the total traffic and orders for each source?"
</Callout>

You can ask questions to the SQL Agent about the data and get the answer in SQL.

<Grid cols={2} className="py-4">
  <div>
    <DataTable loadData="example_data" height={400} />
  </div>
  <div className="p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow">
    <LLM postData="sql_agent" />
  </div>
</Grid>
